AI Description: SuperLU_DIST is a parallel, distributed-memory sparse direct solver for large linear systems with multiple right-hand sides. It is designed for distributed-memory parallel computers and utilizes partial pivoting with static pivoting thresholds. This software package provides a highly parallel sparse direct solver that performs matrix factorization and triangular solution stages efficiently on large-scale parallel machines.
Core Features: Parallel, Distributed-Memory Sparse Direct Solver, Designed For Distributed-Memory Parallel Computers, Utilizes Partial Pivoting With Static Pivoting Thresholds, Efficient Matrix Factorization & Triangular Solution Stages On Large-Scale Parallel Machines
General Tags: Sparse Linear Solver, Parallel Computing, Distributed-Memory Solver, Matrix Factorization
